TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlLanguageConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供 类的类型转换。

span.span: Provides type conversion for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器的主要目的在于， `xml:lang` XML 文件中的现有设置不会影响使用 作为其基础类型的属性的分析。This converter exists primarily so that the existing `xml:lang` settings in an XML file do not interfere with the parsing of attributes that use as their underlying type.
